subject: Order number #4QHNEG
description_text:
Hello, 

I believe my order number is #4QHNEG or my tracking number is 1ZX619C030018505. I paid for better shipping and was told in a prior email that yesterday July 6th was gonna be the date it should have been arriving and it has not arrived and the shipping tracking hasn't updated at all. I would just like an update or something on what's going on. 

Thank you,
Maxwell Newman

conversations.body_text: And I'm really not sure whether or not that's my order number as I can't log in like I was saying but I can confirm the tracking number. Sent from my iPhone
Hi Maxwell Newman,  May I ask which platform you placed the order on? Could you please provide the order date and amount? I will help you look up the order number.

Yes sir I have attached below images of the order # and other such. I used
safari. I'm not sure the exact date but the screenshot of the order
confirmation should have it and is attached. Very sorry have been traveling.

Thank you,
Maxwell Newman

On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 5:18 PM support@simsonn.com
